column2: The ARN of the bucket in which the ECS config resides

[{u'PolicyName': u'ECSServiceRolePolicy', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': [u'ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress', u'ec2:Describe', u'elasticloadbalancing:DeregisterInstancesFromLoadBalancer', u'elasticloadbalancing:Describe*', u'elasticloadbalancing:RegisterInstancesWithLoadBalancer', u'elasticloadbalancing:DeregisterTargets', u'elasticloadbalancing:DescribeTargetGroups', u'elasticloadbalancing:DescribeTargetHealth', u'elasticloadbalancing:RegisterTargets'], u'Resource': u'*', u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
